channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
Hey , ive set myself a challenge to make a widescreen client , so far i have changed the applet frame , and the screen size , but is it possible to move the sprites over to the far right edge of the applet frame so its stop blanking or even move it over then make to stop blinking ? is this possible.... im using H0rns client
i you know how could you tell me a tut , or wwhere the file is i would find this in , thanks!
